projects.name: OppSites
projects.summary: Real estate website for the landlords to advertise their properties visually in the map.
projects.challenge: Ability to display the lands' borders on the map, query by longitude, latitude and nearby properties.
projects.resolution: Use Google Map JS API to draw polygons, save them along with properties' information to PostgreSQL and use PostGIS to query

projects.name: Scout Recruit
projects.summary: Complete solution for HR users to post job ad, recruit candidates and integrate with other platforms
projects.challenge: Biggest project so far in my career with a wide variety of features: Questionnaire, Booking system, Email/SMS automation, 3rd party integrations...
projects.resolution: Make a wide variety of questions in job ads with auto-rating metrics. Use Twilio/Sendgrind for SMS/Emails. Implement each integration according to their public/private API documentation

projects.name: Padmore City
projects.summary: Learning website where providers offer online courses in form of interesting games
projects.challenge: Ability to support questions/answers as casual conversation, rating task and award achievement automatically
projects.resolution: Implement varies of conversations and multi-choice questions, configurable achievement system based on completed tasks metrics

projects.name: Scout Onboard
projects.summary: Complete solution for HR users to manage the onboarding process of eligible candidates
projects.challenge: We need to create and customize the offer letter, approval process, ability for candidate to sign and accept as well as negotiate the offer
projects.resolution: Take advantage of Rails event machine and Mustache placeholders for offer process, JS signature pad and canvas manipulation to capture candidate signature. Rendering and saving base64 image of the signatures to db.

projects.name: CompliLearn
projects.summary: Learning website for schools to manage their courses and staff
projects.challenge: Build 3rd party login for Go1 and different school portals
projects.resolution: Use Auth0 with Custom Social Login scripts to configure OAuth for Go1/school portals

petProjects.name: Flappy Bird AI
petProjects.summary: Constructing an AI for Flappy Bird to play the game itself.
petProjects.challenge: We need the bird to be able to make decision which action they should take at a given time through unsupervised learning and evolution.
petProjects.resolution: We implement neural networks as brains for the birds. For each generation, we mutate the candidates, let them compete and do the natural selection.

petProjects.name: Sudoku Solver
petProjects.summary: A web app letting user input their sudoku by numbers or image and solve it
petProjects.challenge: The biggest challenge is how to read the sudoku from image, I also want to improve the sudoku algorithm on the internet so it is faster for every input combination.
petProjects.resolution: I derive an improved Sudoku algorithm that gives dramatic performance gain over the solution on the Internet, use Python OpenCV and Tesseract OCR to read input from image.

petProjects.name: Personal Website
petProjects.summary: A portfolio playground for showing my information and skillset
petProjects.challenge: Creative website, integrate most interesting and cutting-edge technologies I learned recently
petProjects.resolution: Incorporating dynamic data from local backend server and build up static website with NextJS, 3D layout with ThreeJS
